overview: Back in Vietnam, Major Whittmar sold out his comrades to save his own skin.  Now, he's a rich, ruthless land baron who's getting richer by squeezing out or killing off his neighbors.  But when he and his cronies murder a rancher who threatens to expose them, the man's son, Will, swears vengeance.
tagline: Nothing's worth dying for... except a way of life.
title: A Time to Revenge
